attributes.action: Remove the need for a television license and enforce the BBC to compete on commercial grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has long held an advantage in the market of claiming 'public service broadcasting', and has thus been able to compulsarily charge people for its services. The rate charged has increased, and the public service provided is no greater than other channels which are able to compete commercially. What is flawed is that people are forced to purchase the BBC content to watch other channels, and this should be repealed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
